lead_paragraph: Government forces and their allies have squeezed fighters and civilians in rebel-held parts of the city into a sliver of territory, spokesmen said.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut.

headline.print_headline: Rebels on Run, Aleppo Is Close to Syrian Rule
headline.main: Aleppo Close to Falling Under Complete Control of Syrian Government

snippet: Government forces and their allies have squeezed fighters and civilians in rebel-held parts of the city into a sliver of territory, spokesmen said....
abstract: Syrian government forces appear likely to retake Aleppo in its entirety, having confined rebel fighters to small sliver of territory within city; potential capturing of Aleppo has raised questions about how Pres Bashar al-Assad will proceed with governing deeply divided country.
